footer.contactable_24_7: We are available 24/7 to assist you!

home.title: Transforming Ideas into Digital Reality
home.subtitle: Your Vision is Our Mission
home.vision_content: At Cyborg, we transform your IT visions into success stories. By perfectly combining business acumen with cutting-edge technology, we fuel your growth and elevate your projects to the next level.
home.wish_title: Ready to Make Your IT Wish Come True?
home.wish_content: Share your IT wishes with us, and we will realize them with precision and excellence. Let's embark on a journey where your vision meets our expertise.
home.service_it_consulting_description: Strategic IT solutions to drive your business.
home.service_web_development_description: Creating responsive and engaging websites tailored to your needs.
home.service_it_services_description: Comprehensive IT support and management for seamless operations.
home.project_one_description: A brief description of Project One.
home.faq_answer_1: We offer IT consulting, web development, and IT services.
home.faq_answer_2: You can use the contact form on this page or email us directly.
home.faq_answer_3: Yes, we tailor our services to your specific needs.

it_consulting.content_for_from_idea_to_implementation: Have an idea that you want to bring to life? We help transform your concepts into digital reality. Whether you want to create a new website or add features to your existing one, our team guides you through every step.
it_consulting.content_for_it_strategy: Not sure which technology fits your needs? We provide expert advice to help you choose the right tools and frameworks like React, WordPress, or Angular to achieve your business goals.
it_consulting.content_for_software_consulting: Our software consulting services analyze your company's needs to create technology solutions that enhance your operations. From website development to mobile apps, we ensure your technology investments lead to success.
it_consulting.content_for_it_security: Protect your business from cyber threats like fake forms, attacks, or click fraud. We offer comprehensive IT security services to safeguard your data and ensure your operations run smoothly.
it_consulting.software_development_consulting_descript: Customized software solutions tailored to your unique business needs.
it_consulting.web_consulting_description: Enhance your online presence with modern, user-friendly websites.
it_consulting.mobile_consulting_description: Develop engaging mobile applications for iOS and Android.
it_consulting.saas_consulting_description: Leverage SaaS solutions to streamline your operations.
it_consulting.cloud_consulting_description: Optimize your infrastructure with cloud technologies.

web_development.services_intro: We offer a wide range of web development services:
web_development.content_for_wordpress: We create custom WordPress websites tailored to your needs.
web_development.content_for_angular_development: Our team builds robust Angular applications.
web_development.content_for_custom_software: We develop software tailored to your specific requirements.
web_development.content_for_technologies_tools: We use the latest technologies and tools to deliver the best results.
web_development.cta_description: Partner with us to take your digital presence to the next level.

it_services.content_for_server_management: We manage and maintain your servers.
it_services.content_for_cloud_backup: Secure cloud solutions and backup services.

about_us.hero_subtitle: Innovative IT Solutions Tailored for You
about_us.who_we_are_content: At Cyborg, we are a forward-thinking startup dedicated to delivering cutting-edge IT solutions. Our fresh entry into the industry equips us with innovative ideas and an unbounded passion for technology. We believe that our newness allows us to offer unique perspectives, agile solutions, and personalized attention that established companies might overlook.
about_us.our_mission_content: Our mission is to bridge the gap between affordability and quality in the IT sector. We strive to provide exceptional services that empower businesses to thrive in the digital age. By leveraging the latest technologies and the ingenuity of our team, we aim to become your trusted partner in innovation.
about_us.advantage_point1: Innovative Thinking: We offer creative solutions tailored to your specific needs.
about_us.advantage_point2: Agility: Our streamlined processes allow us to quickly adapt to changing requirements.
about_us.advantage_point3: Personalized Service: We give individual attention to each client to ensure your vision is realized.
about_us.advantage_point4: Competitive Pricing: Our lean structure enables us to offer high-quality services at unbeatable prices.
about_us.advantage_point5: 24/7 Support: Our commitment to you doesn't end with project delivery. We're here for you around the clock.
about_us.how_we_work_step1_desc: Contact us anytime—our team is available 24/7.
about_us.how_we_work_step2_desc: We'll schedule a virtual meeting to understand your goals and requirements.
about_us.how_we_work_step3_desc: Receive a customized plan with transparent pricing and timelines.
about_us.how_we_work_step4_desc: Our expert team implements your project, keeping you updated throughout.
about_us.how_we_work_step5_desc: Post-launch, we provide continuous support to ensure sustained success.
about_us.faq_q1: How can your newness benefit my project?
about_us.faq_a1: Our fresh approach means we're highly motivated to impress and excel. We embrace innovative solutions and are flexible to adapt to your unique needs, offering personal service and dedication that drives success.
about_us.faq_a2: Absolutely! We understand that questions and issues can arise at any time. Our team is always ready to assist you, minimizing any disruption to your operations.
about_us.faq_q3: How do you maintain high quality at competitive prices?
about_us.faq_a3: By working efficiently and leveraging the latest technologies, we reduce overhead without compromising on quality. Our focus is on delivering value to you.
about_us.faq_q4: What industries do you specialize in?
about_us.faq_a4: Our diverse team has expertise across various industries, including finance, healthcare, e-commerce, and more. We're adaptable and eager to understand and tackle the unique challenges of your sector.
about_us.about_text: Our unwavering dedication to understanding each client's unique needs allows us to deliver tailored solutions that drive success.
about_us.mission_text: To bridge the gap between technology and business, offering solutions that empower companies to reach new heights.
about_us.faq_question_1: How can we start a project with you?
about_us.faq_answer_1: Simply reach out to us via email or phone, and we'll schedule an initial consultation to discuss your needs.
about_us.faq_question_2: What industries do you specialize in?
about_us.faq_answer_2: We work across various industries, tailoring solutions to each sector's unique challenges.
about_us.faq_question_3: Do you offer support after project completion?
about_us.faq_answer_3: Yes, we provide ongoing support and maintenance to ensure your solutions continue to perform optimally.

zoho_consulting.title: Zoho Consulting
zoho_consulting.intro_description: Zoho is a comprehensive suite of cloud-based applications designed to enhance your business operations. With over 40 integrated apps, Zoho provides solutions for CRM, finance, project management, collaboration, and much more.
zoho_consulting.services_description: We specialize in implementing and customizing Zoho applications to meet your specific business needs. Our services include:
zoho_consulting.service_2: Zoho Books setup for streamlined accounting
zoho_consulting.service_3: Zoho Projects integration for efficient project management
zoho_consulting.service_4: Custom application development within the Zoho ecosystem
zoho_consulting.cta_title: Ready to Transform Your Business with Zoho?
zoho_consulting.cta_description: Contact us today to discuss how we can help you leverage Zoho's powerful suite of applications.
zoho_consulting.zoho_crm_description: We provide implementation and customization of Zoho CRM to effectively manage your customer relationships.
zoho_consulting.zoho_books_description: Setup and optimization of Zoho Books for seamless financial management and accounting.
zoho_consulting.zoho_projects_description: Integration of Zoho Projects for efficient project planning and collaboration.
zoho_consulting.custom_development_description: Development of customized solutions within the Zoho ecosystem to meet your unique business needs.

legal.title: Privacy Policy and Terms of Use
legal.privacy_policy_content: Your detailed privacy policy content goes here. Andersen Group is fully committed to comply with applicable data protection laws, as we believe that ensuring data protection is the basis of trustworthy business relationships. We are always working to stay compliant - encourage audits, certifications, and provide industry-standard contractual protections. This Data Protection Policy ensures the level of data protection prescribed by the European Union Data Protection Regulations and provides one of the necessary framework conditions for cross-border data transmission. This Data Protection Policy applies to all companies of the Andersen Group, affiliated companies and their employees and is based on globally accepted, basic principles on data protection. The latest version of the Data Protection Policy can be accessed with the data privacy information at Andersen’s website at: andersenlab.com.
legal.data_protection_policy_content:
AIM OF THE DATA PROTECTION POLICY
Andersen Group is fully committed to comply with applicable data protection laws, as we believe that ensuring data protection is the basis of trustworthy business relationships.

We are always working to stay compliant - encourage audits, certifications, and provide industry-standard contractual protections.

This Data Protection Policy ensures the level of data protection prescribed by the European Union Data Protection Regulations and provides one of the necessary framework conditions for cross-border data transmission.

This Data Protection Policy applies to all companies of the Andersen Group, affiliated companies and their employees and is based on globally accepted, basic principles on data protection.
legal.terms_of_use_content:
HELLO!

PLEASE CAREFULLY READ THIS TERMS OF USE AGREEMENT (“TERMS”) BETWEEN YOU AND COMPUTOOLS LLC (“COMPUTOOLS”). THIS DOCUMENT WAS CREATED TO REGULATE YOUR USE OF THIS WEBSITE. BY USING THIS WEBSITE, YOU AGREE TO COMPLY WITH THESE TERMS. YOU MUST NOT USE THIS WEBSITE, IF YOU HAVE ANY OBJECTION TO ANY OF THESE TERMS AND CONDITIONS.

1. GENERAL TERMS
1.1. The website is owned by Computools and is intended to provide information about Computools’ products and services.

1.2. These Terms apply to all visitors and users of the website. The website is intended for users who are at least 18 years old. Users under 18 are permitted to use the website only under the supervision of parents or legal guardians.

1.3. All visitors and users fully assume all risks associated with any damage to hardware and/or software used to access the website.

1.4. Computools strives to provide continuous 24/7 access to the website but does not guarantee it. Access to the website is free of charge. Users are responsible for ensuring they have the technical means to access the website and for paying any telecommunications network fees.

2. RESTRICTIONS
You are specifically restricted from using this website in any way that is or may be damaging to this website, using this website contrary to applicable laws and regulations, or in any way that may cause harm to the website, or to any person or business entity.

3. INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY
All materials on this site, including text, graphics, logos, icons, images, audio clips, digital downloads, data compilations, and software, are the property of Computools and are protected by applicable copyright and trademark laws.

You are granted a limited license only, subject to the restrictions provided in these Terms and Conditions, for purposes of viewing the material contained on this website. You must not republish material from this website (including republication on another website), or reproduce or store material from this website in any public or private electronic retrieval system; you must not reproduce, duplicate, copy, sell, re-sell, visit, or otherwise exploit our website or materials on our website for a commercial purpose, without our express written consent. Elements of the website are protected by trade dress, trade secret and other laws, and may not be copied or imitated in whole or in part. All custom graphics, icons, and other items that appear on the website are trademarks, service marks or trade dress of Computools, its affiliates or other entities that have granted Computools the right and license to use such marks and may not be used or interfered with in any manner without the express written consent of Computools.

Any other use or modification of the content and materials on the website without prior written permission from Computools is prohibited.

4. LINKS TO THIRD-PARTY SITES
On this website, Computools provides links to third-party resources. However, we do not control the materials or content accessible through these links. You use these sites and their content at your own risk. We recommend taking precautions to protect yourself from viruses, worms, Trojans, and other harmful software that may be present on external sites.

5. PRIVACY POLICY
We value your privacy. All personal data collected through this site will be used in accordance with our Privacy Policy.

6. LIMITATION OF LIABILITY
WE ARE NOT RESPONSIBLE FOR ANY DIRECT OR INDIRECT DAMAGES ARISING OUT OF THE USE OR INABILITY TO USE THIS WEBSITE. IF YOU ARE DISSATISFIED WITH THE SITE OR ITS MATERIALS, YOUR SOLE REMEDY IS TO DISCONTINUE YOUR USE OF THE WEBSITE.

7. DISCLAIMER
We are not responsible for any errors or omissions on this site. The website is provided “as is” without any warranties, and we do not guarantee its uninterrupted or error-free access.

8. GOVERNING LAW AND JURISDICTION
These Terms of Use are governed by the laws of the United States, with exclusive jurisdiction granted to the courts of the United States.

9. SEVERABILITY
If any term, provision, or wording in these Terms of Use is found to be invalid, illegal, or unenforceable for any reason, such finding shall not affect any other terms, provisions, or wording in these Terms of Use.

10. CONTACT US
If you have any questions or comments regarding these Terms of Use, please contact us at info@computools.com.

We may update the Terms occasionally, with changes taking effect immediately upon posting unless stated otherwise. We recommend reviewing the Terms periodically for any updates. If you do not agree with the Terms, please stop using the website immediately.

Thank you for your attention and for using our website!

Last updated: November 11, 2024.
legal.cookies_policy_content:
USE OF COOKIES
The Andersen website may use 'cookies' to help you personalize your online experience. Cookies cannot be used to run programs or deliver viruses to your computer. Cookies are uniquely assigned to you, and can only be read by a web server in the domain that issued the cookie to you.

Andersen uses cookies to collect your IP address and browsing information. Cookies are placed on your computer/device only if you consent to it.

In order to record and analyze how visitors use Andersen website as well as to improve visitors’ experience, Andersen collects details of your visits by using Google Analytics counter. Google Analytics counter places and uses cookies that allow Andersen to track website traffic and users’ interaction with our website.

You likely have the ability to accept or decline cookies via your web browser. Most Web browsers automatically accept cookies, but you can usually modify your browser setting to decline cookies if you prefer. If you choose to decline cookies, you may not be able to fully experience the interactive features of the Andersen services or websites you visit.

To learn more about Andersen’s cookie policy, visit our cookie policy page.
